title: Kelly Karger
summary: Kelly Karger superuser Sat, 10/05/2024 - 10:15 Kelly Karger, FCA, FSA, CMAS is an independent Human Capital M&A consultant. She specializes in managing Human Capital activities during corporate transactions.With more than 25 years of consulting experience, Kellys primary areas of concentration include:Human Capital due diligenceTransition planning and separation/integrationPost-close implementation Complex global deals including mergers, acquisitions, divestitures, and joint ventures, separation to standaloneTotal rewards including employee benefits, and pension risk managementHR program managementPrior to starting her independent consulting firm, Kelly served as a Senior Director with Alvarez & Marsal, Willis Towers Watson and Aon Hewitt, where her clients ranged from small manufacturing to large complex organizations across the healthcare, aerospace/defense, airline, hospitality, technology, energy and retail industries. As a Senior Advisor to M&A Leadership Council, Kelly serves as the Council's lead HR Specialist. In this capacity, she shares her expertise with other M&A professionals and organizations involved in corporate growth, consolidation, restructuring and divestitures.Kelly graduated Magna Cum Laude from the University of Minnesota, Duluth with a B.S. in Mathematics and Statistics, was previously named a Risk & Insurance Power Broker in Employee Benefits and is a Fellow of the Conference of Consulting Actuaries, Fellow of the Society of Actuaries and Certified M&A Specialist.
